internationalPatientWorkflow.title: Streamlining Workflow for International Patients
internationalPatientWorkflow.description: Sorriso simplifies managing international patients, allowing clinics to focus on exceptional care. We follow the patient journey from the first contact to the final follow-up, ensuring a seamless experience. Clinic managers and dedicated personnel often have too much to coordinate to provide a constant, world-class patient experience for those traveling the world for life-changing procedures. We understand that the patient experience is a top priority for clinics, and we are here to help. Our platform allows clinics to provide a seamless experience for international patients without the hassle of managing hundreds of moving parts: emails, Zoom links, phone calls, schedules, bookings, and transportation. We have it all covered.
